short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making the Kick VOD-viewer experience better!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We're here to improve your Kick.com viewing experience, now with a VOD-overview for the currently watched streamer!
(Currently you'll need to be on a VOD page for this to work)

New features:
- VOD Overview. Easily check your VOD view progression and switch between VODs! (FIX)

Current features:
- VOD Overview. Easily check your VOD view progression and switch between VODs!
- Track & Restore VOD view progress. Continue where you left off!
- Immersive VOD. Watch like you're in a cinema, fullscreen with chat overlay!
